title: You Have To Give It To Someone You Hate
itunes:title: You Have To Give It To Someone You Hate
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Who do you hate enough?

***

Written by TheLibrarianChick and narrated by Nicole Goodnight

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
